data.message: Thank you Facebook for allowing me to connect with new friends,  conversing with close family and friends,  and connecting with old friends from years pass.  I've been entertained and educated ... made comments and had loads of fun! I love Facebook !

replies.message: Hi there, Betty. Thanks for sharing with us. We're happy to hear you're enjoying your Facebook experience so far. :) Hope you have a wonderful day! -Kate
Thanks for the big help it helped me alot ..make my life strng and I enjyed gwd good friends on f.b. ..God is good..
